data.message: ok....why am I suddenly seeing posts / statuses with a bigger font? I have not made any font size adjustments, only a few are turning up that way, and there is nothing like "only those posting via their phone" are having their posts look like that (I just asked a friend I saw his status like that and he says he's on a desktop).

replies.message: Great question, Kendra. Short text posts may appear larger than any device preferences you have set. If you'd like to adjust the text size of Facebook, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2dMQ9yt. -Jessica

I see them too & have been for weeks. My issue is I can't comment on any news media for some reason. I can post a status update & to friends but am blocked from commenting on news I guess. Suppressing my voice Facebook?
Facebook i have alredy done this and it does not work!!
i am on a laptop and its doing it..

I replied earlier about Market place just appearing, but more important is that a letter I wrote to my husband who just died went Messenger & to a total strangers site. This is very serious. Respectfully, Sue Jones.
Dear Facebook, we should not have to take extra steps to make you stop making us users look like children.
